Text: I was reviewing these vids and the quality of the Good Morning Marine video is poor.  I should not have included it and if you are just beginning the download and can uncheck it from being download then please do so.  I'll upload a better copy in my next Hidden Cam Library (2).

Hey there. Thanks for the torrents. I've downloaded some fantastic stuff from you over the years. It might be helpful to include thumbnails or contact sheets of the videos in the torrents. I downloaded quite a few of these files only to find out that I already had most. They were just named differently. (Also a lot of these are not necessarily hidden cam stuff but staged to appear that way. Similar to what Sneaky Peek does.) Thanks!
